content:
cds-hooks-bot opened Issue #267

## May 2018 Ballot Comment 61

Submitted by @bvdh from Philips Healthcare

Chapter: CDS Services
Section: Security and Safety
Type: A-S :bulb:
In Person Requested? Yes :bust_in_silhouette:

Existing Wording:

Each EHR vendor/provider SHOULD maintain a "white list" (and/or "black list") of the CDS Services it has vetted,

Comment:
Also mentioned earlier in the spec. Can we remove the previous mention?

## Triage Information

Triage Notes:
Reviewed with Bas

Proposed Disposition: Persuasive with Mod
Proposed Disposition Comment:
We will remove the duplicate information from the Limitations section and any non-duplicative content from the Limitations section will be moved into our Security section (3rd bullet point in Limitations) that's also related to Security.

_This issue was imported by @cds-hooks-bot from the consolidated CDS Hooks May 2018 ballot spreadsheet._

cds-hooks-bot edited Issue #267

## May 2018 Ballot Comment 61

Section: Security and Safety

Each EHR vendor/provider SHOULD maintain a "white list" (and/or "black list") of the CDS Services it has vetted,

cds-hooks-bot commented on Issue #267

Proposed Disposition: Persuasive with Mod
Proposed Disposition Comment:
We will remove the duplicate information from the Limitations section and any non-duplicative content from the Limitations section will be moved into our Security section (3rd bullet point in Limitations) that's also related to Security.

cds-hooks-bot commented on Issue #267

## :telephone_receiver: CDS Working Group Block Vote (5-30-2018)

Meeting notes: http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=File:2018-05-30_CDS_WG_Call_Minutes.docx

Julia Skapik moved the following disposition, seconded by @brynrhodes.

Disposition: Persuasive with Mod
Disposition Comment:
We will remove the duplicate information from the Limitations section and any non-duplicative content from the Limitations section will be moved into our Security section (3rd bullet point in Limitations) that's also related to Security.

:+1: For: 12
:expressionless: Abstain: 0
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:
